TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Faruk_Begolli, title = Faruk_Begolli, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Faruk_Begolli} }

S.FORM: kawas 1944, byacing 2 ru 14 ryax qu hintgan nya, metaq squ kawas 2007, 8 byacing ru 23 ryax hinqilan nya. 63 kawas qu qinnxan nya babaw rhzyal. hiya ga squliq ka pzyangay ega, ru mrhuw pgleng pzyangay ega, minkahul squ Kosowa, ko'ka nqu Arpania. hmzinas 60 msyaw qu kinnalay nya ega, mnaki squ qnxan na pkabalay ega aring squ kawas 1966 ru mucing 1980. kawas 1997 Begolli mwah sa Kosowa, pcbaq raygakuse p'ega; pzyang pucing knalay nya ega ga yaqu kawas te 2006, iy pucing spzyangay nya ega uzi ga kawas 2008, ru kyapun nag an ru wayal mhuqil squ 2007 la. qsuzyan nya Adil Begolli ga, mrhuw squliq ka pkbalay kamok na Telibi ru ega. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of actors

kawas 1944, byacing 2 ro 14 ryax qo hintgan nya, metaq sqo kawas 2007, 8 byacing ro 23 ryax hinqilan nya. 63 kawas qo qinnxan nya babaw rhzyal. hiya ga sqoliq ka pzyangay ega, ro mrhow pgleng pzyangay ega, minkahol sqo Kosowa, ko'ka nqo Arpania. hmzinas 60 msyaw qo kinnalay nya ega, mnaki sqo qnxan na pkabalay ega aring sqo kawas 1966 ro mocing 1980. kawas 1997 Begolli mwah sa Kosowa, pcbaq raygakose p'ega; pzyang pocing knalay nya ega ga yaqo kawas te 2006, iy pocing spzyangay nya ega ozi ga kawas 2008, ro kyapon nag an ro wayal mhoqil sqo 2007 la. qsozyan nya Adil Begolli ga, mrhow sqoliq ka pkbalay kamok na Telibi ro ega. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of actors
